title: How to Get a Sagittarius Man to Chase You

steps.title: It seems counterintuitive, but a Sagittarius man loves a moving target.
steps.content: It seems counterintuitive, but a Sagittarius man loves a moving target. As astrologer Angel Eyedealism highlights, "if they're approaching you and coming forward, that's a huge sign of interest." However, she cautions, "the second you become controlling, then they'll take off." Show him you’ve got your own interesting and fulfilling life to live by not being available every time he texts. Your time is valuable! Plus, his inquisitive mind will be interested to hear all about your plans when he finally gets a moment alone with you. [1] X Research source Avoid cold or terse language if you have to tell him you’re busy. Use a friendly but mysterious tone to keep him wondering what you’re up to. Try something like, “I’d love to see you, but I’ve got plans downtown that night.”

steps.title: Sagittarians love puzzles.
steps.content: Sagittarians love puzzles. They are ruled by the planet Jupiter and enjoy piecing things together to broaden their horizons and discover the unknown. To keep a Sagittarius man on your tracks, open up about yourself bit by bit. He may lose interest in you if he hears your entire life story in one sitting at a housewarming party. [2] X Research source Flirty cliffhangers are a great way to keep your Sagittarius guy crushing on you. Tell him you’ll let him know about your craziest adventure … next time.

steps.title: A Sagittarius will lose interest if he feels tied down.
steps.content: A Sagittarius will lose interest if he feels tied down. Your centaur needs the freedom to explore his ambitions and work towards his lofty goals. Avoid excessive texting and hovering or he may begin to think you’re acting clingy. [3] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. Explore your own hobbies and interests while you’re apart so the conversation will spark the next time you see him. [4] X Research source FOMO (fear of missing out) is a great tool to keep your Sagittarius man chasing after you. Let him wonder what you’re up to. He’ll be dying to hear about it the next time you meet.

steps.title: Sagittarius guys love to laugh!
steps.content: Sagittarius guys love to laugh! High-energy talks full of jokes and fun banter are a great way to engage your crush and massage his valued intellectual side. If he thinks you're too serious up front, he’ll lose interest in getting to know you further. To a Sagittarius man, a little light teasing is a fun and irresistible challenge that will keep him coming back for more. This applies to texting too! Flirty GIFs and memes are a fun way to let him know you’re thinking about him without explicitly telling him your feelings.

steps.title: Your Sagittarius man wants to know the real you.
steps.content: Your Sagittarius man wants to know the real you. Don’t pretend to share his interests or fake a laugh at his jokes. The Archer is very perceptive and values the truth. He has a strong code of ethics and will pursue someone when he feels they are on the same moral page, so keep it genuine! [5] X Research source A Sagittarius guy will lose interest if he feels you are putting on an act to impress him. He doesn’t usually have a “type” and is far more interested in learning about what makes a person unique. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Don’t beat around the bush.
steps.content: Don’t beat around the bush. It’s easy to overlook, but a little directness does a lot to make you stand out from the crowd. A Sagittarian will appreciate your honest and direct approach, [7] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. and find your way with words impressive. You’ll know he’s really listening to you and wants to hear what you have to say when he reciprocates your openness. [8] X Research source

steps.title: A Sagittarian operates with logic more often than his feelings.
steps.content: A Sagittarian operates with logic more often than his feelings. This is one of the things that makes it difficult to make him chase after you. A Sagittarius man is more likely to view tears or anger as emotional manipulation than other signs, so keep your conversations cool, calm, and collected. [9] X Research source Restraining your emotions doesn’t mean you can’t communicate how you feel. Express yourself in simple, honest terms when you feel the need to let him know how you’re doing. Say something like, “I’m sad we didn’t get any alone time together this week” or “I’m excited for our hike this weekend!”

steps.title: A Sagittarius man appreciates someone who stands out from the crowd.
steps.content: A Sagittarius man appreciates someone who stands out from the crowd. Speak confidently at social gatherings and be unapologetic with your thoughts and opinions. The centaur wants to know his potential partner on a deep and personal level. He’s more likely to chase someone with a strong sense of self than someone who blends in with the crowd. [10] X Research source

steps.title: A clean, classic look with a quirky touch appeals to a Sagittarian.
steps.content: A clean, classic look with a quirky touch appeals to a Sagittarian. Every man is wowed by glitz and glam from time to time, but the Sagittarius guy appreciates a partner that looks clean and well put together day-to-day. A fresh scent paired with bright colored pieces or accents will appeal to his fire sign aesthetic, and a humorous or unique accessory will spark his curiosity. Whether you’re dressing up for a big night out or a casual get together, confidence is key! It’s like the old saying goes, “it’s not about what you wear, but how you wear it.”

steps.title: A Sagittarius man thirsts for knowledge and exploring the unknown.
steps.content: A Sagittarius man thirsts for knowledge and exploring the unknown. Share a random trivia fact you learned, or show him a new skill you picked up at work. Sagittarians are lifelong learners and seek someone who will help them grow and expand their knowledge over the years. Drop him new information like a trail of breadcrumbs and he’ll be on your trail in no time. [11] X Research source Text him a cool or flirty new fact to let him know you’re thinking about him. Try something like, “Whoa, I just found out that there’s a real flying bicycle! Made me think of you :)”

steps.title: Your Sagittarian loves to be in the know.
steps.content: Your Sagittarian loves to be in the know. Show him your favorite secluded spot to watch the stars, or take him to the exclusive new club in town with a secret password to get in. He wants to see anything and everything that’s new, different, and exciting. Be his guide to the unknown and he’ll be coming back to you again and again for more. [12] X Research source Don’t stress about revealing personal or elaborate secrets. Just a hint of something hiding under the surface will be enough to pique his insatiable interest. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Your centaurian crush thrives on the unexpected.
steps.content: Your centaurian crush thrives on the unexpected. He’s active, playful, and pretty much down for anything! Ask him if he wants to check out that brand new restaurant downtown tonight, or tell him to pack an overnight bag because you’re driving across the state for his favorite band’s concert tomorrow. The bigger and bolder, the better! [14] X Research source Your Sagittarius guy craves someone who can make life interesting and exciting. You’ll know he’s into you when he follows your lead on these spontaneous outings.

steps.title: A Sagittarius man doesn’t like to stay in one place too long.
steps.content: A Sagittarius man doesn’t like to stay in one place too long. He loves movement and action. [15] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. A well-traveled partner is a must for this wanderer. Tell him about your favorite trips, your foreign adventures, or your dream vacation destinations. He’ll find you irresistible! [16] X Research source If you’re close enough to plan a trip together, go for it! Take him somewhere he’s never been, whether it’s a new country or a unique hang a few towns over. He’ll lust over your sense of adventure. A Sagittarius needs the freedom to travel and wander to his heart’s content. If he invites you to join him on his many excursions, you know he’s chasing after your company.

steps.title: Your Sagittarian crush won’t feel contained in the great outdoors.
steps.content: Your Sagittarian crush won’t feel contained in the great outdoors. [17] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 13 January 2022. Being outside speaks to his sense of adventure and opens the door to many unexpected and spontaneous pursuits. Stroll through a new neighborhood, or explore an unfamiliar nature park. A Sagittarius man doesn’t shy away from new locales, so the sky is truly the limit!
